verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I have found favor in Your eyes, Teach me Your ways, teach me Your ways. That I may be pleasing in Your sight. Teach me Your ways, teach me Your ways. And if You have called me by my name, Teach me Your ways, teach me Your ways. And O, let Your presence ever remain, Teach me Your ways, teach me Your ways.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to know You, Lord, I want to see Your glory and grace. And may Your presence Go with us all of our days.{/lang-eng}
